dc:title:
From Union Square to Rome,
Chapter 3 - Early Years
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes her sheltered childhood and her voluminous reading. After being baptized in the Episcopalian Church and loving the services she disavows organized religion as her sense of social justice developles.
